name: Cid [FFBE]
abilities: At the start of your attack phase, choose 1 of the following. "Choose up to 2 Chararcters. Activate them", "Until the end of this turn, all Forwards you control gain" "Cannot be chosen by Summons of your opponent.".
When Cid [FFBE] is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may pay {3}. When you do so, play Cid [FFBE] from the Break Zone onto the field dull.
